content:
That sounds like an interesting and thought-provoking idea for a book! When writing about a futuristic setting, it can be helpful to consider the societal, cultural, and technological advancements that might exist in the future and how they could potentially impact human emotions and relationships. It might also be useful to consider any challenges or conflicts that could arise as a result of these changes and how the characters in the book might navigate and resolve them.

One thing to keep in mind when writing a book is to create well-rounded and believable characters that readers can relate to and care about. You might also want to consider the overall plot and structure of the book and how you want to guide the reader through the story.

I hope this helps to get you started on your book. Let me know if you have any specific questions or would like further guidance as you begin writing.
